title.narrative: PA CAR IPC contract through Sida HPA contribution

description.narrative: Expected Result/target 1:Enhanced Non -Governmental Organisation (NGO) engagement in country IPC activities in Central African Republic (CAR) and Zimbabwe strengthens the quality and transparency of the IPC analyses process. a. Increased engagement of NGOs (with a goal of at least 4 -6 NGOs participating per country) supports expanded plurality in the consensus -building part of the analysis workshop and diversity in information sources. b. Greater transparency through participation of at least two NGO representatives in the full IPC process: pre -analysis (includes primary data collection and preparation), analysis (e.g., workshops) and post -analysis (communication etc.) and support for use of the findings by decision makers. c .Consolidation of one country -based community of practice of agencies involved in IPC per country that supports sustainability of IPC quality. Expected Result/target 1:Enhanced NGO engagement in country IPC activities in CAR and Zimbabwe strengthens the quality and transparency of the IPC analyses process. a. Increased engagement of NGOs (with a goal of at least 4 -6 NGOs participating per country) supports expanded plurality in the consensus -building part of the analysis workshop and diversity in information sources .b. Greater transparency through participation of at least two NGO representatives in the full IPC process: pre -analysis (includes primary data collection and preparation), analysis (e.g., workshops) and post -analysis (communication etc.) and support for use of the findings by decision makers .c. Consolidation of one country -based community of practice of agencies involved in IPC per country that supports sustainability of IPC quality. Expected Result/target 3:Technical Work of NGOs at the global level through the Technical Advisory Group (TAG) improves the quality and inclusiveness of analyses by developing, field -testing, and reporting on expanded protocols in the thematic area of gender. a.
